sense.def:
Kadar je del telesa
poised
, je popolnoma negiben, vendar pripravljen, da se v trenutku premakne.

seg.quote: I saw her hand poised to strike.

sense.def:
To be poised to do something
pomeni biti pripravljen, da v trenutku ukrepamo.

seg.quote: His party seems poised to return to power.

sense.def:
To be poised
pomeni biti miren in dostojanstven.

seg.quote: She was poised and diplomatic on the telephone.
